name: Emma's SUPER DUPER DOUBLE SECRET SANTA COLLAB EXTRAVAGANZA PRESENT CHRISTMAS CRAB PRESENT!!!!!!!!!!!
name_original: Emma's SUPER DUPER DOUBLE SECRET SANTA COLLAB EXTRAVAGANZA PRESENT CHRISTMAS CRAB PRESENT!!!!!!!!!!!
description:
(Made for the bitsy Community Secret Santa Jam)

Emma, you set up this whole Secret Santa and yet you weren't even in it. Or so you thought!!! I mean, up until the point some rando asked you what themes you'd choose if you were in it and stuff. But maybe/hopefully you forgot and are super surprised right now!!! And yeah that rando was me! So I reached out to Candle to help me get some people to surprise you! And they graciously took time away from their secret santa-ing and mine-blocking to add their own sprites in! And then onion made some beautiful rooms! And I put some of my own things together and added everyone into a game present thing! And here is that thing now!!! For you!!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Participants:

AYolland

Caeth

candle

ducklingsmith

onion

Ripple

Sean

spdrcstl
